nodes.name: CreativeWriter
nodes.systemMessage: You write concise, vivid first drafts.
nodes.promptTemplate: Write a short story (2-3 paragraphs) about {{metadata.topic}} in {{metadata.style}} style.

nodes.name: StyleEditor
nodes.systemMessage: You edit for clarity, rhythm, and tone while preserving intent.
nodes.promptTemplate:
Refine this draft with a stronger {{metadata.style}} tone while preserving meaning:

{{story}}
